page.title: 16MIDMAR SCHOOL
page.content: The school is over twenty years old, and the 'hut', an extra classroom, was built four years ago.The school has fifty-three children, and three teaching staff (The head mistress also teaches).Each teacer teaches a composite class.We study Language, Mathematics, Reading, Social and Religious studies.In our school we have five specialist staff.We have teachers for Art, Gym, Drama, Home Economics and Music.We also have a remedial teacher who helps children with Language and Maths.Each term we have 'activities', which include netball, puppetry, collage, chess, tie-dying, cycling proficiency and birdwatching.Mothers offer to help. Each child spends five periods at each activity.
